spell_tooltip.description: Heals the target for 650,943 over 15 sec.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 388,789 Arcane damage to the target, and 134,337 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 271,807 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 3%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 29,701 Nature damage and then an additional 415,042 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 347,591 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 25%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Heals the target for 499,473 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 257,818.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 260,735 over 9 sec.
Nature's Swiftness now has 2 charges.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 34,380 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 1.7 million over 3.7 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 11,141 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.
The cooldown of Swiftmend is reduced by up to 40%, based on the current health of the target. Cooldown is reduced more when cast on a lower health target.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 160,006.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 50,427. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 35,757 over 6 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 104,022.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 30% less over time.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 22,811 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 15% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 604,625.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 8 sec.

Affected allies are healed for 1.4 million, split evenly among them.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.

Rip and Rake damage has a chance to cause Bloodseeker Vines to grow on the victim, dealing 185,596 Bleed damage over 6 sec.

Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Efflorescence healing has a chance to cause Symbiotic Blooms to grow on the target, healing for 168,977 over 6 sec.

Multiple instances of these can overlap.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom healing increased by 10%.
When you remove an effect with Soothe or Nature's Cure, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 21,390.
Your Regrowth's healing to yourself is increased by 35%.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 137,479 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 26,470.
When Bloodseeker Vines or Symbiotic Blooms grow, they have a 20% chance to cause another growth of the same type to immediately grow on a valid nearby target.

Bloodseeker Vines increase the damage your abilities deal to affected enemies by 5%.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.

Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.

Rake the target for 48,108 Bleed damage and an additional 514,627 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 522,353 over 8 sec
   2 points: 783,530 over 12 sec
   3 points: 1 million over 16 sec
   4 points: 1.3 million over 20 sec
   5 points: 1.5 million over 24 sec

Call down a burst of energy, causing 369,610 Arcane damage to the target, and 123,132 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 8 Astral Power.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 687,320 Astral damage.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
